text: The Bandit of Zhobe is a 1959 British historical adventure movie directed by John Gilling and starring Victor Mature, Anne Aubrey, Anthony Newley, Norman Wooland, Dermot Walsh, Walter Gotell, Denis Shaw, Paul Stassino. It was distributed by Columbia Pictures. ==Other websites== * Category:1959 adventure movies Category:1950s historical movies Category:British adventure movies Category:Columbia Pictures movies Category:Movies set in India Category:Movies directed by John Gilling
title: The Bandit of Zhobe
